pages.text: The athame is the most sacred instrument for a witch. $(br2)It is a cerimonial blade, typically used during rituals, and is often involved in summoning rites. $(br2)It is also used in sacrificial killing, to obtain specific items from specific entities...

pages.title: Uses
pages.text: An athame can be used in multiple ways. $(br2)The easiest one is to place it on an altar, representing the swords. $(br2)An altar equipped with an athame will distribute its energy to nearby witches, and restore their internal power more quickly. $(br2)To place the athame, right-click it on a formed altar.
